directions: Mix sweetened condensed milk, cherry pie filling, marshmallows, bananas, pineapple, whipped topping, and pecans together in a bowl. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk (such as Eagle Brand®)
3 bananas, sliced, or more to taste
1 (8 ounce) container whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®)
title: Marshmallow Pink Cloud
